text:
The contextual menu entry "Remove" is not in a position which is consistent with
the desktops. It should be placed just after the "Paste" action, to follow the
standard-way-of-doing-things(tm) :
 Cut
 Copy
 Paste
 Delete/Remove

Thank you
creator: michel.nolard@gmail.com

text: I agree - fixed in SVN r542683
creator: sebb@apache.org
